page.title: 06A SICK STORY
page.content: I woke up at 4.30 a.m. & felt sick. I sat up & read till 5.30. Suddenly I was sick, called for Mum but Dad came. He got me some water in glucose & I went back to sleep. I woke up at 7.30 to hear my Mum saying, 'Wakey-Wakey! How are you feeling, oh you look aw- ful!' I told her I felt awful. She told me to keep quiet & go back to sleep. I felt I was going to die but fortunately I didn't. When my Mum had taken Mark to school she came back to see me. She brought up a bowl with her & it was just in time! I slept most of the day, when I woke up it was 4.00. Mum bathed my head with something cold A schoolfriend came with my{Domesday {work}but I was sick so she had to go. I lay on the settee & dozed off. Later I felt better, had a biscuit & drink & was sick yet again. I went to bed at 7.30 hoping to feel better next day.
